name: nth-grid

1.0.0.name: nth-grid
1.0.0.description: Nth-Grid is a versatile semantic CSS grid system with legacy browser support for Less, PostCSS, Sass, and Stylus.

scripts.build: npm-run-all -s build:dist -p build:demo build:fixtures build:docs:sass build:sassdoc
scripts.build:demo: npm-run-all -s build:demo:hbs -p build:demo:less build:demo:postcss build:demo:sass build:demo:stylus
scripts.version: run-s prepare lint test && git add -A docs/sassdoc
scripts.watch:demo:sass: nodemon -C -q -w demo -w src/demo -e scss -x run-s build:demo:sass

description: Nth-Grid is a versatile semantic CSS grid system with legacy browser support for Less, PostCSS, Sass, and Stylus.
readme:
# Nth-Grid

[![NPM](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/nth-grid.svg?style=flat-square)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/nth-grid)
[![GitHub Workflow Status (master)](https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/jhildenbiddle/nth-grid/test.yml?branch=master&label=checks&style=flat-square)](https://github.com/jhildenbiddle/nth-grid/actions?query=branch%3Amain+)
[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg?style=flat-square)](https://github.com/jhildenbiddle/nth-grid/blob/master/LICENSE)
[![jsDelivr](https://data.jsdelivr.com/v1/package/npm/nth-grid/badge)](https://www.jsdelivr.com/package/npm/nth-grid)
[![Sponsor this project](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?style=flat-square&label=Sponsor&message=%E2%9D%A4&logo=GitHub&color=%23fe8e86)](https://github.com/sponsors/jhildenbiddle)

Nth-Grid is a versatile semantic CSS grid system with legacy browser support for [Less](http://lesscss.org/), [PostCSS](https://github.com/postcss/postcss), [Sass](http://sass-lang.com/), and [Stylus](http://stylus-lang.com/).

- üöÄ [Documentation](https://jhildenbiddle.github.io/nth-grid/)
- ‚öôÔ∏è [SassDocs](https://jhildenbiddle.github.io/nth-grid/sassdoc)

If you benefit from this project, please consider lending your support and encouraging future efforts by [becoming a sponsor](https://github.com/sponsors/jhildenbiddle).
